subjects.name: Engineering Physics
subjects.short: Bridging the gap between school physics and UG engineering courses.

subjects.name: Differential Equations and Vector Calculus
subjects.short: To enlighten the learners in the concept of differential equations and multivariable calculus.

subjects.name: Basic Electrical and Electronics Engineering
subjects.short: To expose to the field of electrical and electronics engineering laws and principles.

subjects.name: Engineering Graphics
subjects.short: To enable the students with various concepts like dimensioning, conventions and standards related to Engineering Drawing.

subjects.name: Data Structures
subjects.short: To provide the knowledge of basic data structures and their implementations.

subjects.name: Engineering Physics Lab
subjects.short: To understand the concepts of interference, diffraction and their applications.

subjects.name: IT Work Shop
subjects.short: To introduce the internal parts of a computer, peripherals, I/O ports, connecting cables.

subjects.name: Electrical and Electronics Engineering Workshop
subjects.short: To impart knowledge on the fundamental laws & theorems of electrical circuits.

subjects.name: Data Structures Lab
subjects.short: To strengthen the ability of the students to identify and apply the suitable data structure for the given real-world problem.

subjects.name: NSS/NCC/SCOUTS and Guides/ Community Service
subjects.short: To impart discipline, character, fraternity, teamwork, social consciousness among the students.
